  physical_appearance: \The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of people in a coffee farm. Three rectangular farm beds can be seen and there is an individual in each one of them
 using a hoe to separate and spread the coffee beans out. There are others who are watching and talking to one another. There is a farmhouse at the back
 and trees in the background. \\Drying the coffee 127\\ is stated in white at the lower right hand side of the photograph. \

 dye) farmers (people in agriculture) farming (function) farmhouses indigenous people

  sgcool_label_text: This is an original photograph from G R lambert \u0026 Company that shows the process of drying the coffee.

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of people in a coffee farm. Three rectangular farm beds can be seen and there is an individual in each one of them, using a hoe to separate and spread the coffee beans out. There are others who are watching and talking to one another. There is a farmhouse at the back, and trees in the background. ""Drying the coffee 127"" is stated in white at the lower right hand side of the photograph. "
